column4: anyone have any experience with server motherboards? I'm looking to build a dedicated server instead of my 10 year old computer....I'm looking at this one: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16813131228
I guess I'm wondering if anyone has used it, or would have any comments about it.
is there an issue that the motherboard only supports ddr2 800?
isn't that more a hardware question? join ##hardware
